title: New: Band of Horses – Knock Knock
content:
I’ve never quite understood how Band of Horses have achieved such commercial success.

They’re never had a ‘hit’ single’ and they rarely tour, yet seem to have a dedicated fanbase  growing with the release of each record; a true testament to their quality. With a fourth album titled Mirage Rock out later in the year via Brown/Columbia, the five piece have unleashed Knock Knock, the upbeat first track to be taken from the aforementioned LP. In typical Band of Horses style, it’s the sound of the deep south, almost feeling like it should have fitted somewhere on the Dukes of Hazard soundtrack. Check it out below as well as a handful of UK tour dates (on sale 13 July), and keep your ears peeled for Mirage Rock out 17 September.

15 November – Birmingham – HMV Institute

16 November – Glasgow – Academy

19 November – Manchester – Academy

20 November – London – Hammersmith Apollo

Mirage Rock tracklisting:

Knock Knock

How To Live

Slow Cruel Hands of Time

A Little Biblical

Shut-In Tourist

Dumpster World

Electric Music

Everything’s Gonna Be Undone

Feud

Long Vows

Heartbreak on the 101
